import React from 'react'; import { Box, Heading, Text, VStack, Container, Stack, Center, Link, Icon, Grid, GridItem, Button, useColorModeValue } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { FaArrowRight } from 'react-icons/fa'; import ScrollRevealComponent from './ScrollReveal'; import './style.css'; // Custom CSS file for hover effect import { FaBalanceScale, FaCreditCard, FaFileSignature, FaCode, FaHeadset, FaHandshake } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ChapterApplicationPage = () => { return ( Want more info? Email us College Chapters Empowering student chapters to champion diversity, equity,
and inclusivity initiatives on campus and beyond.
Truly full-service community Whether you are just starting with workshops or aiming to have a national level hackathons, we will have your back! Legal & financial backend You reap the benefits of 501(c)(3) nonprofit status—with none of the boring paperwork. Included is free FDIC-insured banking¹ backed by Wells Fargo, and payment processing backed by Stripe. Visa credit cards Avoid long, complex reimbursement processes. We'll provide unlimited, free Visa credit cards for your team that allow for spending directly from your balance. We'll manage the accounting—just snap a picture of your receipts. $25k+ in free software Google Workspace (including Gmail, Calendar, Drive) at your custom domain? We got it. AWS credits? You betcha. We're constantly finding new corporate partners to bring you the best software, all for free. Liability waiver management We'll automatically handle liability waivers, photo release forms, and other legal stuff. It's all integrated into Dash's registration platform, so you'll never even need to think about boring paperwork. We have your back. 24-hours support We have designed the program for each chapter to have dedicated support. We'll be responding back in 24 hours and in the days leading to your event, we'll respond back in 12 hours. Corporate partner support We're backed by 19 corporate sponsors that help us in making this community better. We will help you get in touch with our corporate sponsors for the events you will be hosting. {/* Add more GridItems for additional content */}
Why Should You Start a Chapter? Forge Connections Build lasting community networks and foster meaningful relationships within your campus community. Drive Change Effect positive, impactful change on campus by advocating for causes that matter to you and your peers. Develop Leadership Gain valuable leadership skills and inspire others to take initiative and make a difference in your community.
What is the College Chapter Program? The College Chapter Program is an initiative designed to empower students to create and lead local chapters focused on [specific topic/interest]. It provides resources, mentorship, and a platform for students to collaborate and make an impact in their communities. Who can join the College Chapter Program? The program is open to undergraduate and graduate students from accredited colleges and universities worldwide. Students passionate about [specific topic/interest] and eager to initiate positive change are encouraged to apply. What are the benefits of joining? Joining the College Chapter Program offers numerous benefits, including access to exclusive resources, networking opportunities with industry professionals, skill development workshops, and the chance to implement impactful projects within your community. How can my college start a chapter? Starting a chapter is straightforward. Interested students can apply to become chapter leaders, gather a team of motivated peers, and follow the program's guidelines for chapter formation. Guidance and support will be provided throughout the process. Is there a fee to join? No, there is no fee to join the College Chapter Program. It is free for students accepted into the program. However, chapters may seek funding for specific projects or events through grants and sponsorships. How are chapters supported? Chapters receive ongoing support through webinars, mentorship sessions, networking events, and access to an online community platform where they can collaborate, share resources, and showcase their initiatives.
); }; export default ChapterApplicationPage;
